content: hole put the stitch on the right handle needle © lots of lotus cowl by laura snyder february 1 2016 k1ll knit 1 long left insert your needle in the same hole as k1lr knit one stitch through this hole and put the stitch onto the right hand needle so it looks like this… try to keep the gauge even and loose for both long stitches © lots of lotus cowl by laura snyder february 1 2016
